title: Inu to Omawari-san.
sinopse:
Dog-complex policeman, Miyoshi, was captivated by the popular model, Kanae, who always looks like a stray dog. However, Kanae never paid attention to him, until a day Miyoshi managed to get close to him thanks to an incident. Will the love of these two naïve people be able to go smoothly?

(Source: MU)

Included one-shot:
Volume 2: Happy Man
